title: New: Tallows – Flat Bones
body:
Oklahoma’s **Tallows** show yet again why they’re one of this years most exciting new artists on _Flat Bones_, another cut taken from their debut LP which is out in a few days time.

Comparisons to Death Cab To Cutie and Vampire Weekend may well be the first that spring to mind, yet there’s a lot more to their sound than simply being good copycats. Check out _Flat Bones_ below, and check back for their debut album, _**Memory Marrow**_ which is out 31 August.

‘_dreamers took my dreams / i’m wide awake / my pillow screams’_
